alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 2:32PM MDT until April 24 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON PDT MONDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Rain is expected to switch to snow during the morning. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Heavy and wet snow may cause tree limbs to break and isolated powers outages are possible. Plan on low visibility and quickly changing road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
